required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Drug Interaction Between SHR4640 Tablets and Furosemide Tablets in Healthy Volunteers (Single Center, Single Arm, Open, Self-control)
clinical_study.official_title: Drug Interaction Between SHR4640 Tablets and Furosemide Tablets in Healthy Volunteers (Single Center, Single Arm, Open, Self-control)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the effect of SHR4640 tablets on the pharmacokinetics of furosemide tablets in healthy male volunteers, using a single-center, single-arm, open, self-control design.

primary_outcome.description: Area under the curve from the time of dosing. Dosing time to the last measurable (positive) concentration.
Area under the curve from time 0 to infinity

facility.name: West China Hospital of Sichuan University
